claim.body: particular a ceiling loudspeaker unit, comprising: a housing having a first housing portion, wherein provided in the first housing portion are a woofer unit, a baffle panel and a tweeter unit in a 2-way coaxial system, wherein the tweeter unit has a tweeter horn with a plurality of legs and a plurality of openings at the edge of the tweeter horn, wherein the woofer unit and the tweeter unit are arranged in the baffle panel in sunk relationship, wherein the proportion of the areas of the openings with respect to a reference area is between 30% and 70%, wherein the reference area is defined by an inside diameter and an outside diameter of the tweeter horn, wherein the inside diameter of the tweeter horn is defined by the depth of the openings, and wherein the outside diameter of the tweeter horn is defined by the free-standing ends of the legs.
claim.claim-text: 1. A loudspeaker unit, in particular a ceiling loudspeaker unit, comprising: a housing having a first housing portion, wherein provided in the first housing portion are a woofer unit, a baffle panel and a tweeter unit in a 2-way coaxial system, wherein the tweeter unit has a tweeter horn with a plurality of legs and a plurality of openings at the edge of the tweeter horn, wherein the woofer unit and the tweeter unit are arranged in the baffle panel in sunk relationship, wherein the proportion of the areas of the openings with respect to a reference area is between 30% and 70%, wherein the reference area is defined by an inside diameter and an outside diameter of the tweeter horn, wherein the inside diameter of the tweeter horn is defined by the depth of the openings, and wherein the outside diameter of the tweeter horn is defined by the free-standing ends of the legs.

claim.body: the legs of the tweeter unit extend to the edge of the baffle panel.
claim.claim-text: 2. A loudspeaker unit as set forth in claim 1 wherein the legs of the tweeter unit extend to the edge of the baffle panel.

claim.body: the cross-section of the tweeter unit is greater than the cross-section of the woofer unit.
claim.claim-text: 3. A loudspeaker unit as set forth in claim 1 wherein the cross-section of the tweeter unit is greater than the cross-section of the woofer unit.

claim.body: a tweeter is arranged in front of the woofer unit.
claim.claim-text: 4. A loudspeaker unit as set forth in claim 1 wherein a tweeter is arranged in front of the woofer unit.

claim.body: the proportion of the areas of the openings with respect to a reference area is between 40% and 50%.
claim.claim-text: 5. A loudspeaker unit as set forth in claim 1 wherein the proportion of the areas of the openings with respect to a reference area is between 40% and 50%.
